data.title: Relief and health promotion fund for Friborg public transport staff
data.meta_description: Fonds de secours et de promotion de la sant√© en faveur du personnel des transports publics fribourge...
data.text: Provide temporary financial assistance to members of the personnel of one of the companies of the TPF group who fall into need following a prolonged illness or an accident affecting themselves or their relatives as well as for other reasons. exposing to discomfort; provide, exceptionally, temporary financial assistance to pensioners of one of the companies of the TPF group who fall into need following a prolonged illness or an accident affecting themselves or their relatives as well as for other reasons exposing them to embarrassment; provide financial assistance to members of the staff of one of the companies of the TPF group who find themselves in a temporary financial precariousness resulting from the founding of a family, a situation of over-indebtedness, a separation or a divorce, d '' invalidity not yet covered by the social insurances concerned, death or other comparable causes; provide, in the event of the death of a member of the personnel of one of the companies of the TPF group, financial assistance to his survivors intended to participate in the funeral expenses; participate financially in the activities of TPF group companies in connection with the promotion of employee health and safety. The foundation does not pursue profit or commercial purposes.
